m0._description: Transform extension mechanism:    to reference an authority or rules for a type of transformation

c11._description: for hex transforms, using the C11 syntax: \u0061\\U0001F4D6

css._description: for hex transforms, using the CSS syntax: \\61 \\01F4D6, spacing where necessary

gost._description: Euro-Asian Council for Standardization, Metrology and Certification

java._description: for hex transforms, using the Java syntax: \u0061\uD83D\uDCD6

mcst._description: Korean Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism

percent._description: for hex transforms, using the percent syntax: %61%F0%9F%93%96

perl._description: for hex transforms, using the perl syntax: \\x{61}\\x{1F4D6}

plain._description: for hex transforms, with no surrounding syntax, spacing where necessary: 0061 1F4D6

ungegn._description: United Nations Group of Experts on Geographical Names

unicode._description: to hex with the Unicode syntax: U+0061 U+1F4D6, spacing where necessary

xml._description: for hex transforms, using the xml syntax: a📖

xml10._description: for hex transforms, using the xml decimal syntax: a📖
